data.title: The Madness of Dr. Tube [La Folie du Docteur Tube] (Two photographs from the 1915 film) by Abel Gance (director, screenwriter); Albert Dieudonne (starring): (1915)
data.meta_description: Le Film d'Art, France - 1915 - Photograph from the 1915 French experimental short film, struck from the original negative circa 1936. With manuscript annotations and agency stamps on the verso. Dr. Tube develops a powder that distorts reality after ingestion. He tests it out on himself, a dog, and a two couples. An early experimental film that uses distorted lenses and mirrors to create special effects that mimic an altered state of consciousness. 7 x 5 inches. Near Fine. - The Madness of Dr. Tube [La Folie du Docteur Tube] (Two photographs from the 1915 film)
